verbs.description: ingrave (third-person singular simple present ingraves, present participle ingraving, simple past and past participle ingraved)

examples: […] M. Anthony Bos, who both etched and ingraved in a Stile of his own, did not ſucceed ſo well; […] .
But if these black adventures I survive, / Ev'n till this mortal body be ingrav'd, / You shall be lord of that which you have sav'd.
